meaningMnemonic:
Something with a <kanji>vague</kanji> <kanji>nature</kanji> is also quite <vocabulary>vague</vocabulary>. 

Note that you need to add と to the end of this word to make it an adverb, and たる to make it an adjective!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
